attributes.action: take responsibility for checking permission to work for all foreign nationals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently government puts the total responsibility for checking a workers elligibility to work in the UK on the employer.

Meantime they issue dozens of different types of visas and give out NI numbers like confetti. Yet they are happy to fine employers £10,000 if they get it wrong.

As government seem unable to control who comes into this country and fails to remove those who shouldn't be here, they should take responsibility for working status.

It is very simple to do - all that needs done is for government to check employment status BEFORE issuing an NI number, give it an expiry date, and provide a simple on-line system for providing the expiry date on entering a name and NI number.
